verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) O Clap <S%H8628><s%> your hands, <S%H3709><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> peoples; <S%H5971><s%> Shout <S%H7321><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy. <S%H7440><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> is to be feared, <S%H3372><s%> A great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He subdues <S%H1696><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> us, And nations <S%H3816><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> our feet. <S%H7272><s%>
He chooses <S%H977><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us, The glory <S%H1347><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> He loves. <S%H157><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> has ascended <S%H5927><s%> with a shout, <S%H8643><s%> The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> with the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a trumpet. <S%H7782><s%>

Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> praises; <S%H2167><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to our King, <S%H4428><s%> sing <S%H2167><s%> praises. <S%H2167><s%>
For God <S%H430><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> with a skillful <S%H4905><s%> psalm. <S%H4905><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> reigns <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> God <S%H430><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> on His holy <S%H6944><s%> throne. <S%H3678><s%>

The princes <S%H5081><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> have assembled <S%H622><s%> themselves [as] the people <S%H5971><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham; <S%H85><s%> For the shields <S%H4043><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> belong to God; <S%H430><s%> He is highly <S%H3966><s%> exalted. <S%H5927><s%>
